#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int rev(int n)
 {
  int r,num=0;
  while(n>0)
   {
    r=n%10;
    num=(num*10)+r;
    n=n/10;
   }
  return num; 
 }
int main()
 {
  int t;
  cin>>t;
  while(t--)
   {
    int sum,n1,n2;
    cin>>n1>>n2;
    sum=rev(n1)+rev(n2);
    cout<<rev(sum)<<endl;
   }
  return 0;
 }
